Therefore circumference of the circle with \(r_1=_{j}_, Circum_1=2*\pi*r_1\)
Similarly for the other circle, \( Circum_2=2*\pi*r_2\)
therefore the desired \(circumference= circum_1+circum_2\)
\(cirmum=2*\frac {22}7*(_{j}_+_{k}_)\)
Now let the radius of the desired circle be r
We have \(circum=2*\pi*r_=2*\frac {22}7*(_{j}_+_{k}_)\)
